lead_paragraph: Britain could win more medals at the Rio Olympics than at any previous 'away' Games and possibly exceed the record haul of 65 at home in London four years ago, UK Sport said on Tuesday.

headline.print_headline: Britain Aiming for Record 'Away' Medal Haul in Rio
headline.main: Britain Aiming for Record 'Away' Medal Haul in Rio
